alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:18PM EST until January 30 at 2:01AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson, Wilkinson and Washington Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Oconee...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.9 feet, bankfull conditions continue along the river. The Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp...just upstream and right bank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge...continues to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 17.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.1 feet on 01/05/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 830 AM EST.
